location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that important dipatches from the company - via Bussora [Basra] - are enclosed with it. The letter discusses other administrative issues and reports news from Persia that Zackey Cahn's [Zaki Khan] revolt has been quelled.
